text: I don’t understand @UPS at all. I ship packages all the time with them and they never follow instructions. They have a policy which says drivers are to use their discretion when delivering packages - meaning if the area is not safe.... [1/2] https://t.co/BKT2ndQ6zs

then the driver has every right to not leave it outside. Fine. That’s fair. Because we deal with perishable goods, we’ve started placing a CLEAR note on all of our boxes that says the box should be left AT/OUTSIDE the door if no one is home to receive it. @UPS @UPSHelp https://t.co/GSCFRZHMd9

So now I’m HELLA confused. If the box states to leave it outside if no one is home, why can’t the drivers follow simple instructions?! This is not the first time this has happened. And I’m actually vexed. @UPS @UPSHelp Pls fix.
Please tell me, how do you IGNORE this note? Meanwhile - the recipient has been home ALL DAY and did not receive a single knock on their door. @UPS @UPSHelp https://t.co/EQqGgq3Qtf
@SamuellaTakyi I'm more than happy to take a look into this for you. To accurately assess the situation. Please, DM tracking and phone number, with the delivery address. Thanks, ^LG
@SamuellaTakyi Thank you for reaching out. My team and I would be happy to look into your ongoing issues for you. Please DM us so that we can further assist you. ^JG https://t.co/wKJHDXWGRQ
@UPSHelp I’ve already sent a DM with more info
